Tests for intersection between a ray and a plane (triangle) and returns the time of collision.

The current fps in readable form (less decimal places)

Reads a config file and returns the information as a config object

relativeCenterOfMass - Variable in class application.CustomObject
The center of mass of the object relative to its position
relativeCenterOfMass() - Method in class application.CustomObject
Calculates the relative center of mass of the object assuming mass only comes from vertices and each vertex has equal mass

removeObject - Variable in class application.ConfigSimulation
Is there an object waiting to be removed? If so this will be the position of the object to remove, otherwise -1 suggests no object waiting to be removed

Renderer - Class in application

resolveCollision(ArrayList<AABB>, double, int, int) - Method in class application.PhysicsSimulation
Resolves a collision between two objects that have intersecting AABBs and updates them if a full collision is present
rInc - Variable in class application.ConfigController
The amount the rotation increments without fine control selected
rot - Variable in class application.Camera
The rotation of the camera about x,y and z axis
rot - Variable in class application.ObjectInit

rotateAboutPoint(Position, double, double, double) - Method in class application.CustomObject
Rotates the object about a point given an x axis rotation, y axis rotation, z axis rotation and the position of the point relative to the object.
rotation - Variable in class application.CustomObject
The rotation of the object about x,y,z axis
Rotation - Class in application
Stores a rotation in 3d space, made up of an X, Y, and Z axis rotation
Rotation() - Constructor for class application.Rotation
Creates a rotation object with no rotation.
Rotation(double, double, double) - Constructor for class application.Rotation

Rotation(Rotation) - Constructor for class application.Rotation

rotationMatrix - Variable in class application.CustomObject
The matrix representing rotation of the object around x,y,z axis (4x4 matrix)
run() - Method in class application.ConfigCreatorSim

run() - Method in class application.PhysicsSimulation

runButton - Variable in class application.MainGUIController
 
runSim(String) - Method in class application.MainSimulation
